name: Madvent
description:
Foreword: The following is the description as of the original 8 PM deadline.
in this game the game isn't finished but i t might work pleas etry SUBMITTED WITH 90 SECONDS REMAINING

Madvent!
Play your way through 24 days of micro-games that’ll delight and surprise.

Engine: Unity

Editier:  We fixed a huge but tiny teensy bug in the code in the wee minutes after the jam. For the best experience, please download the day zero patch 1.1. If you want to see the game exactly as it was at the deadline, download 1.0. 0.1 is the original build from before the deadline extension.
